text: Edwin Bowman is a Democratic member of the West Virginia Senate, representing the 1st District since his election in 1994. ==External links== *West Virginia Legislature - Senator Edwin Bowman official government website *Project Vote Smart - Senator Edwin Bowman Jr. (WV) profile *Follow the Money - Edwin Bowman **2008 2006 2004 2002 1998 Senate campaign contributions Category:West Virginia state senators Category:1946 births Category:Living people Category:21st-century American politicians
title: Edwin Bowman
